\begin{document}

Q4 Product Planning Meeting November 28, 2024 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM Conference Room B / Zoom Sarah Chen

Agenda

\begin{enumerate}
  \item Review Q3 metrics and outcomes
  \item Discuss Q4 priorities and roadmap
  \item Resource allocation and timeline
  \item Open discussion and questions
\end{enumerate}

Discussion Notes

\subsection{Q3 Review}

Sarah presented the Q3 results:

\begin{itemize}
  \item User acquisition up 23\% vs. target of 20\%
  \item Feature adoption for new dashboard at 67\%
  \item Customer satisfaction score: 4.2/5.0
\end{itemize}

Key learnings from the quarter:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Mobile users engaging 2x more than desktop
  \item Onboarding flow improvements reduced drop-off by 15\%
  \item Support ticket volume down 30\% after help center launch\\The mobile engagement data suggests we should prioritize mobile-first features in Q4.
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Q4 Priorities}

The team discussed three major initiatives:

\textbf{1. Mobile App v2.0}

\begin{itemize}
  \item Complete redesign based on user research
  \item Offline mode support
  \item Push notification improvements
  \item Target: December 15 launch
\end{itemize}

\textbf{2. API Platform}

\begin{itemize}
  \item Public API for third-party integrations
  \item Developer documentation and sandbox
  \item Partner onboarding program
  \item Target: January 31 beta
\end{itemize}

\textbf{3. Enterprise Features}

\begin{itemize}
  \item SSO integration (SAML, OIDC)
  \item Advanced admin controls
  \item Audit logging
  \item Target: February 15\\Mobile App v2.0 is the priority for Q4. API Platform will run in parallel with a smaller team. Enterprise features will begin planning now for Q1 execution.
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Resource Discussion}

Current team capacity:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Engineering: 8 developers (2 on maintenance)
  \item Design: 2 designers
  \item QA: 2 testers
\end{itemize}

Alex raised concern about timeline for mobile launch given holiday schedules. Team agreed to:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Front-load critical work before Dec 20
  \item Skeleton crew Dec 23-Jan 2
  \item Buffer week built into January\\Hire one contract developer for Nov-Dec to support mobile push. Jordan to coordinate with recruiting.
\end{itemize}

Action Items Draft mobile v2.0 PRD with detailed requirements Sarah Dec 2 Create mobile UI mockups for team review Jordan Dec 5 Spike on offline sync architecture Alex Dec 3 Prepare Q4 marketing calendar Taylor Dec 4 Set up mobile testing environment Morgan Dec 2 Post contract developer job listing Jordan Nov 29

Decisions Summary

\textbf{} & Mobile App v2.0 is top priority for Q4 & \textbf{} & API Platform runs parallel with reduced scope \\
\textbf{} & Enterprise features move to Q1 & \textbf{} & Hire contract developer for mobile support \\
\textbf{} & Holiday buffer week added to schedule \\
\end{tabular}
\endgroup

Next Meeting \textbf{Date:} December 5, 2024 \\ \textbf{Time:} 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM \\ \textbf{Topic:} Mobile v2.0 Design Review \\ \textbf{Pre-work:} Review Jordan's mockups (will be shared Dec 4)
